verses.text: Behold how good \w and|strong="H3068"\w* how pleasant \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* brethren \w to|strong="H3068"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3068"\w* unity.

\w Like|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* precious ointment \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* head, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* ran down upon \w the|strong="H0834"\w* beard, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* beard \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron, \w Which|strong="H0834"\w* ran down \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* skirt \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* garment:

\w As|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* dew \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Hermon, \w which|strong="H1004"\w* descendeth \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w mount|strong="H5927"\w* Sion. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w there|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord hath commandeth blessing, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* life \w for|strong="H5921"\w* evermore.
